# <a name="permanently-delete-email-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="da85d-102">Eliminar permanentemente el correo electrónico en Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="da85d-102">Permanently delete email in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="da85d-103">Si desea eliminar el correo electrónico o vaciar la bandeja de entrada:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="da85d-103">If you want to delete email or empty your inbox:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="da85d-104">Selecciona los mensajes que quieras eliminar (o selecciona el círculo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="da85d-104">Select the messages you want to delete (or select the circle</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="da85d-105">junto a **bandeja de entrada** en la parte superior de la lista de mensajes para seleccionar todos los mensajes de la bandeja de entrada).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="da85d-105">next to **Inbox** at the top of your message list to select all messages in your inbox).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="da85d-106">En la parte superior de la página, **Seleccione eliminar** (para toda la carpeta **vacía**o vacía con un **foco** / vacío**diferente** si la bandeja de entrada prioritarios está habilitada).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="da85d-106">At the top of the page, select **Delete** (for the whole folder **Empty folder**, or **Empty Focused** / **Empty Other** if you have Focused Inbox enabled).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="da85d-107">Para depurar todos los correos electrónicos eliminados, abra la [carpeta elementos eliminados](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) y seleccione **vaciar carpeta**y, a continuación, seleccione **elementos recuperables** en la parte superior de la página y seleccione **vaciar carpeta** de nuevo.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="da85d-107">To purge all your deleted email, open your [Deleted Items folder](https://outlook.live.com/mail/deleteditems) and select **Empty folder**, then select **Recoverable items** at the top of the page and select **Empty folder** again.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="da85d-108">Para obtener más información, lea [eliminar correo electrónico en Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="da85d-108">To learn more, read [Delete email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/a9b63739-5392-412a-8e9a-d4b02708dee4?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
